xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
$
OUR STORY
/$
$
La Grande Martier was built on a love for soulful flavors, warm hospitality, and unforgettable experiences. Nestled in downtown Stuart’s historic Post Office Arcade, our restaurant offers a fresh take on Low Country cuisine—where coastal ingredients meet elegant technique.
Whether you’re gathering for dinner in the dining room, sipping bourbon in the speakeasy, or catching live music in the breezeway bar, our mission stays the same: to serve comfort with intention and create moments worth lingering over.
Proudly locally owned and rooted in community, we’re honored to share our Southern table with you.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
"We make food that makes people happy"
/$
$
-Lisa Councilman
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
LA GRANDE
MARTIER

/$
$
A Historic Venue
/$
$
La Grande Martier is an expansive hidden gem in the historic 1920 POST OFFICE ARCADE in America's happiest & most beautiful seaside small town. Offering live music and enchanting ambiance, along with refined Low Country cuisine, we specialize in planning & executing your perfect occasion.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
/$
$
$
$
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
$
Tailored to Your Occasion
/$
$
Our unique venue is magical for customized birthdays, anniversaries, bridal & baby showers, wedding rehearsals & receptions, bachelor/bachelorette celebrations. Our space can be privatized for your business and corporate events. Also ideal for local business meetings where privacy is an asset.
/$
$
CONTACT
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
DOWNTOWN STUART
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
$
Personalized Planning
/$
$
Event bookings include a personal dedicated event planning concierge & a Special Event Planning Guide to manage your menu, libations, and budget.
For availability and event information, contact us at
Info@GrandeMartier.com
/$
/$
/$
$
